xwikidoc.content: {{velocity output="false"}} #macro (maybeSet $document $propName $propValue) #if ($propValue) #set ($discard = $document.set($propName, $propValue)) #end #end {{/velocity}}{{velocity wiki="false"}} ## ## This page acts as an endpoint for taskgantt macro to update the tasks. ## It also contains some simple logic for updating the status based on progress. ## This workaround is needed until the following JIRA issue is fixed: ## XWIKI-20704: NullPointerException (NPE) when accessing objects with ComputedField properties from REST ## ## Parameters: ## - taskDocument: document id (eg. wiki:Space.Page); ## - startDate, endDate: new times, given as unix epoch milliseconds; ## - progress: new progress value, 0-100 number; ## ## In case of a failure, returns a JSON object with a `data` field containing the error text, ## as defined in the translation keys. ## #if ("$!request.outputSyntax" == 'plain') #set ($discard = $response.setContentType('application/json')) #end #set ($taskDocument = $request.taskDocument) #if (!$xwiki.exists($taskDocument)) #set ($discard = $response.setStatus(404)) $jsontool.serialize({'data':$services.localization.render('taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.notExists')}) #else #set ($taskDocument = $xwiki.getDocument($taskDocument)) #set ($taskObject = $taskDocument.getObject('TaskManager.TaskManagerClass')) #if (!$taskObject) #set ($discard = $response.setStatus(404)) $jsontool.serialize({'data':$services.localization.render('taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.missingObject')}) #else #if (!$services.security.authorization.hasAccess('edit', $taskDocument)) #set ($discard = $response.setStatus(401)) $jsontool.serialize({'data':$services.localization.render('taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.permissions')}) #else #set ($discard = $taskDocument.use('TaskManager.TaskManagerClass')) #if ($request.endDate)#set ($end = $datetool.toDate($numbertool.toNumber($request.endDate).longValue()))#end #if ($request.startDate)#set ($start = $datetool.toDate($numbertool.toNumber($request.startDate).longValue()))#end #maybeSet($taskDocument 'progress' $request.progress) ## Set status automatically when 100%. #if ($request.progress == '100') #set ($discard = $taskDocument.set('status', 'Done')) #end #maybeSet($taskDocument 'startDate' $start) #maybeSet($taskDocument 'duedate' $end) #set ($discard = $taskDocument.save($services.localization.render('taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.comment'), true)) #set ($discard = $response.setStatus(200)) $jsontool.serialize({}) #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
